item.title: Development and validation of an easy-to-use and interpretable machine learning based calculator predicting five year-weight trajectories after bariatric surgery: a multiple international cohort SOPHIA study (Lancet Digital Health)
item.description: An interpretable, tree-based prediction model for long term weight loss after bariatric surgery.

item.title: Impact of robotic assistance on complications in bariatric surgery at expert laparoscopic surgery centers. A retrospective comparative study with propensity score (TBA)
item.description: Does robotic assistance help bariatric surgery? A causal inference study.
